titles.title: Dot Bit Retro: Boku dake no Kusogee
Dot Bit Retro - ぼくだけのクソゲー

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-anime projects
tag.description: Many anime are created as part of larger projects encompassing many shows without direct relation to one another. Normally, there is a specific idea in mind: for example, the http://anidb.net/t4859 [Young Animator Training Project] aims to stimulate the on-the-job training of next-generation professionals of the anime industry, whereas the http://anidb.net/t3763 [World Masterpiece Theatre] aims to animate classical stories from all over the world.

tag.name: Tate Anime
tag.description: Tate Anime (Vertical Anime) is a mobile device application by http://anidb.net/cr721 [Production I.G] dedicated to the streaming of exclusively produced http://anidb.net/t5852 [short-episodes anime] in http://anidb.net/t7052 [vertical format]. On 31.05.2018, it was replaced by Anime Beans, a rebranded application offering the same content and adding more on a daily basis. Please note that this tag should only be applied to anime originally produced for the mobile app, not to anime later ported to it.
